branchCategory.name: C(D)UX, Free Mount Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Low Speed
branchCategory.description: <p>The series CUX single rod, double acting, low speed free mount cylinder saves space and allows direct and precise mounting. Low speed option can be used in low speed and low pressure applications. It is available in 6mm to 32mm bore sizes with stroke lengths up to 50mm. Options include auto-switch capabilities, free mount choices, recessed switch mounting grooves and rubber bumpers standard.  </p>
